Name: Tabitha Mittens
Content:
Hey you got the research report! thank you so much! lets take a look
...
 well according to this report foreign child labor is cheaper than domestic labor, and most of our customers are fine with it as long as it happens somewhere else and they don't have to think about it to much. All this data shows that the company should actually shift more of its production to child labor.
...maybe I'll just cancel the presentation and we never talk about this again, okay?
